outlined.description: Styles the text field as an outlined text field. (`label` or `placeholder` required)

input-id.description: The id attribute of the <input> and the for attribute of the <label>.

label.description: A text caption or description for the text field, which use the input's `placeholder` attribute instead.

disabled.description: Styles the text field as a disabled text field.

required.description: Styles the text field as a required text field.

fullwidth.description: Styles the text field as a full width text field.

end-aligned.description: Styles the text field with an end-aligned input.

icon.description: Indicates an icon element with a leading icon.

with-leading-icon.description: Styles the text field as a text field with a leading icon.

with-trailing-icon.description: Styles the text field as a text field with a trailing icon.

prefix-text.description: Sets the text content of the prefix.

suffix-text.description: Sets the text content of the suffix.

with-counter.description: Styles the text area as a text area with an internal character counter.

helper-text-id.description: Required for the id attribute of the <ui-textfield-helper>.

pattern.description: Specifies a regular expression that an <input> element's value is checked against

minlength.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in an <input> element

maxlength.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an <input> element

min.description: Specifies a minimum value for an <input> element

max.description: Specifies the maximum value for an <input> element

step.description: Specifies the interval between legal numbers in an input field

rows.description: Specifies the visible number of lines in a text area

cols.description: Specifies the visible width of a text area
